name: Tiny Arcade Racers
description:
Tiny Arcade Racers is a top-down 2.5D arcade racing game. Players may choose to compete against AI drivers in the World Tour or race for the best timing in the Time Trial. In the in-game garage, players can customize the colours of their vehicles.

Compete in the World Tour
Compete against 5 other AI drivers across 3 different terrains.

Secure the best timings in Time Trial
Secure the fastest timings across 5 laps.

The Garage
Unlock and customize your vehicles with different colours.

Take your Pick
Choose from 7 playable vehicles with different speeds, handling, and grip!

Colourful Terrains
Race on 11 tracks across 3 colourful terrains.
